If not, the workaround suggested in the original posting seems reasonable.

Does [`tf.custom_gradient`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.7/tensorflow/python/ops/custom_gradient.py#L33) (in 1.7, `tf.contrib.eager.custom_gradient` in 1.6) help?

You can use that to define the custom gradient that appropriately masks out portions that are of interest.

If not, the workaround suggested in the original posting seems reasonable. 
I'm perhaps misunderstanding what you'd want as a feature.
